NAME: Jaipal Singal
ABOUT:
Seasoned Chartered Accountant with 15 years of rich & diverse experience with diversified industries (manufacturing, Retail, B2C business & E-commerce), diversified companies (MNC’s, Indian companies, Listed Public companies, Unlisted Private companies & Start-up’s) and diversified life stage of companies (Established highly profitable companies (Mature), mid-stage growing companies (Growth), upcoming greenfield subsidiaries of established foreign companies (Nurturing), establishing product market fit and reaching break-even point (Start-up).

Currently as CFO of Urban Ladder have played an instrumental role in the turn around journey of the company. Led and successfully completed fund raising for the company from large global private equity investors including Saif Partners, Sequoia Capital, Kalaari Capital & Steadview Capital. In addition to private equity, arranged funds through multiple alternate sources including Venture Debt, Credit lines from NBFC’s and Working capital lines from Banks. 

Prior to joining Urban Ladder, worked with Arvind Fashion Brands, Marks & Spencer and Mahindra Retail in senior finance leader roles. Handled 5 legal entities at Arvind in the Fashion Brands & Retail space. Led these companies to close multiple acquisitions, licensing and setting up of 4 international footwear brands in India and JV partnership deals including 2 deals with Bollywood & Cricket Celebrities as JV partners and equity shareholders during the tenure.Worked across projects to reduce COGS by 1% globally in M&S and successfully partnered the acquisition and transition of Babyoye into the Mahindra group. Prior to that, was the Country Financial Controller for DIAB group, a Swedish MNC, where in addition to handling finance, IT, legal and statutory matters, played an instrumental role in nurturing the greenfield business & turning the business profitable from scratch in a span of 3 years.

EDUCATION.Institute Name: The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India

EXPERIENCE.Designation: Head of Finance & Operations - South Asia

ORGANISATIONS.Name of Organisation: The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India
